Package photos.controllers

Interface Screen

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminController, AlbumController, PhotoController, SearchResultsController, TagController, UserMainPageController
public interface Screen
Allows user to go back to previous screen, logout, or quit application
Author:
Ibrahim Khajanchi, Karl Sequeira

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void goBack​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    Goes back to previous screen
    void logout​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)  
    default void logOut​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    Logs out of application
    void quit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)  
    default void Quit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    Quits whole application
